page.title: 17Local Industry
page.content: There is only one factory in the area:{Godwin Pumps.}It was founded over one hundred years ago by William Joynes Godwin.His first activities were draining fields by digging ditches. He then started to provide water by drilling a borehole and building a windmill to pump the water to the surface. Mr.Godwin's business was given a boost when at the turn of the century he successfully pumped water around the estate at Hatherop. The water came from an artesian well. Today the company makes pumps small enough for a garden fountain and large to drain gravel pits.Many of these pumps are exported. Most of the hundred workers live within five mies of the factory.
